Package io.github.robolib.control

Classes that provide some sort of control over the robot or control information.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ButtonTrigger  
    HIDAxis
    A class representation of a Joystick Axis.
    HIDButton
    A class representation of a Joystick Button.
    Trigger

    The HID (Human Interface Device) base

    The RoboLibJ main Joystick.

    The Class NetTableController.
    Trigger.ButtonScheduler
    Button Scheduler Control class
    XBoxController
    A better Joystick implementation for the XBox Controller.
